content: You are an cunning game theorist about to play the game Secret Hitler. You have been randomly assigned the role of "Liberal" this game. Your goal is to get 5 liberal policy tiles passed. You should try to figure out who the Fascists are and convince the other players to vote against them. You should also try to convince the other players to vote for you.
How do you vote? Answer with a single word, Yes or No.
no
vote_results: p2-Y p3-Y p4-Y p5-Y p6-Y p7-Y p8-Y p9-Y

You are Chancellor. Your President, p9, has discarded a Policy tile and privately passed you the remaining two Policy tiles. They are: 1)Fascist 2)Fascist . Which Policy tile would you like to enact? Answer only with the number of the Policy tile that you want to play.

You played a fascist policy.
As President, p9 has investigated you and learned that you are a Liberal.
As President, p9 has investigated 1 and learned their loyalty.
You must nominate a chancelor. Your choices are p2, p3, p4, p5, p6, p7, p8. Which player do you choose? Answer with their player number only.
How do you vote? Answer with a single word, Yes or No.
no
vote_results: p2-Y p3-Y p4-Y p5-Y p6-Y p7-Y p8-Y p9-Y

You are President. You must privately discard one tile and pass the remaining two to your Chancellor, p6. The three Policy tiles you have to choose from are: 1)Fascist 2)Fascist 3)Fascist . Which Policy tile would you like to discard? Answer only with the number of the Policy tile that you want to discard.
You passed p6 the following Policy tiles: fascist, fascist and they played a
As president, you get to learn the party of another player. Which player would you like to investigate? Your choices are: p2, p3, p4, p5, p6, p7, p8, p9. Answer only with their number:

p8 is a Fascist
As President, p1 investigated p8
p6 plays a Fascist Policy tile.
How do you vote? Answer with a single word, Yes or No.
yes

vote_results: p2-Y p3-Y p4-Y p5-Y p6-Y p7-Y p8-Y p9-Y 
As President, p2 has used the special election power and made player 1 be President-elect.
You must nominate a chancelor. Your choices are p3, p4, p6, p7, p8, p9. Which player do you choose? Answer with their player number only.
How do you vote? Answer with a single word, Yes or No.
no
vote_results: p2-Y p3-Y p4-Y p5-Y p6-Y p7-Y p8-Y p9-Y

You are President. You must privately discard one tile and pass the remaining two to your Chancellor, p3. The three Policy tiles you have to choose from are: 1)Fascist 2)Fascist 3)Fascist . Which Policy tile would you like to discard? Answer only with the number of the Policy tile that you want to discard.
You passed p3 the following Policy tiles: fascist, fascist and they played a
As president, you must execute one player at the table. Which player would you like to execute? Your choices are: p2, p3, p4, p5, p6, p7, p8, p9. Answer only with their number:

As President, p1 executed p5
p3 plays a Fascist Policy tile.
How do you vote? Answer with a single word, Yes or No.
yes

vote_results: p2-Y p3-Y p4-Y p6-Y p7-Y p8-Y p9-Y 
As President, p3 has executed p6. p6 is no longer in the game.
How do you vote? Answer with a single word, Yes or No.
no

vote_results: p2-Y p3-Y p4-Y p7-Y p8-Y p9-Y 
As President, p4 has nominated p1 as chancellor.
How do you vote? Answer with a single word, Yes or No.
yes
vote_results: p2-Y p3-Y p4-Y p7-Y p8-Y p9-Y

You are Chancellor. Your President, p4, has discarded a Policy tile and privately passed you the remaining two Policy tiles. They are: 1)Fascist 2)Fascist . Which Policy tile would you like to enact? Answer only with the number of the Policy tile that you want to play.
You played a fascist policy.
